div.p: To Askle[piades, royal scribe of the Arsinoite nome, Hera]kle[ides division], from Pt[ollas, son of NN, the son] of Ptollas from the metr[opolis], registered in the quarter of the camp of Apollonios. My relatives Dios[koros], son of Hermas, the son of Petheus, mother uris, and Spartas, son of Po[, mother] Ammo[n]ous and Pt, son of Hermas, the son of [Pe]theus, mother [ ur]is, all 3 subject to poll-tax [in the] same quarter of the camp of Apollon[ios], died in the month of [NN] of the present year 16 of [Aurelius] Antonin[us] Caesar, the [lord]. Therefore I request that they be included in the list of those, who have died, as in similar cases. (m. 2) To the scribes of the city. [If the] above mentioned really died carry out what is appropriate as in similar cases with the risk [at your charge], if [anything contrary] to what is proper occurs. (m. 3) I have signed.
